summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel C) will convene on March 18, 2024, with a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss various zoning cases and adjustments requested by residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The meeting will include a staff presentation, public hearing, and public testimony. Key items on the agenda involve the review of uncontested cases and individual cases requiring special exceptions and variances related to zoning regulations.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include requests for special exceptions to fence height and opacity regulations at two locations: 4447 Brookview Drive and 11601 Liberty Commons Court. Additionally, there is an individual case at 1426 Morrell Avenue requesting multiple variances related to side-yard setbacks and floor area ratio.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the minutes from the previous meeting held on February 22, 2024, and will deliberate on the specific zoning requests presented in the uncontested and individual cases. Public participation is encouraged, with registration required for those wishing to speak.
